actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt certain additional aircraft museums from federal fuel taxes and the federal tax on the use of civil aircraft and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt government chartered air museums operated exclusively for the care or use of antique, custom-built, racing, military or other special types of aircraft from the excise taxes on special fuels and the use of civil aircraft.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt certain additional aircraft museums from federal fuel taxes and the federal tax on the use of civil aircraft and for other purposes.
